pages.text: Ailments, fire and negative effects are slowly removed from all creatures near the ritual.$(br2)$(warning) This also includes hostile creatures.$(br2)In addition, Villagers who are recovering from the Zombie curse will do so quicker while the ritual is active, and the weakness effect applied to them will not be removed.
$(standing_stones) As a $(l:rituals/tiers)$(bold)tier II$() ritual, $(l:rituals/ritual_purity#multiblock)two runed pillars of oak are required to begin$(). Please see later pages of this entry.
Two $(l:rituals/standing_stones)runed pillar$() of oak is required.

pages.title: Ritual Specifics
pages.text: $(bold)Duration:$() The ritual lasts $(ritual:purity/SECONDS/duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Size:$() The ritual will search for within an area of $(ritual:purity/radius_x) and $(ritual:purity/radius_z) blocks horizontally, and by $(ritual:purity/radius_y) vertically.$(br2)$(bold)Purification$(): Purification is performed ever $(ritual:purity/SECONDS/interval) seconds for the duration of the ritual, with each entity having 1 negative ailment removed from them, including fire.
$(bold)De-Zombification$(): Zombie-cursed villagers already undergoing a process of being cured will have that process sped up $(ritual:purity/MULT/zombie_count)x.
